sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Verizon ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Verizon has lost about 4.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Wal-Mart ( WMT ), trading down 2.6%.
Wal-Mart is lower by about 7.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.6%, and Intel ( INTC ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
